text: Gwyneth Paltrow's website is stirring up some controversy. Frazer Harrison / Getty Images Gwyneth Paltrow is receiving backlash for a recent Goop article about ` ` achieving your leanest livable weight.'' The article drew criticism for appearing to equate health with thinness. One Twitter user thought the article was promoting ` ` how to be as thin as possible without dying.'' There's no question that the wellness advice Gwyneth Paltrow preaches on her website Goop are controversial. But for many readers, the website's recent article on how to obtain ` ` your leanest livable weight'' is taking controversy to a new level. The 45 - year - old actress and her lifestyle brand are under fire for promoting severe weight loss
